CREATE_WALLET_DISCLAIMER.TEXT: ZORG ERVOOR DAT JE ERG VOORZICHTIG BENT MET DE BACK-UP WOORDEN. DIT ADVIES IS ALGEMEEN VAN AARD EN GEEN JURIDISCH OF FINANCIEEL ADVIES.
MNEMONIC_SHOW.TITLE: Je Wallet back-up
HISTORY.NO_TXS_YET_TEXT: Maak snel gebruik van je Metaverse Wallet !
SETTINGS.RESET_TEXT: Reset alle data uit je Wallet, zorg ervoor dat je je back-up woorden beschikbaar hebt!
SETTINGS.RESYNC_TEXT: Forceer de Wallet alle transacties en saldo's te synchroniseren.
IMPORT_WALLET_ERROR_MESSAGE: Error bij importeren Wallet, controleer de gegevens en probeer opnieuw.
IMPORT_WALLET_CONNECTION_MESSAGE: Error bij verifieren Wallet, probeer het zometeen nog een keer.
ERROR_SEND_TEXT: Kan de transactie niet aanmaken, controleer de gegevens en probeer het opnieuw.
MNEMONIC_CONFIRM_TEXT: Om zeker te zijn dat je de back-up woorden juist genoteerd heb, kan je ze nu in de goede volgorde zetten.
BACKUP_WORDS_BACKED_UP_TEXT: Bevestig dat je de back-up woorden genoteerd hebt
BACKUP_WORDS_CONFIRM_SKIP_TEXT: Weet je zeker dat je door wilt gaan zonder bevesting van de back-up woorden van je wallet
MESSAGE.ERROR_CONNECT_BLOCKCHAIN: Probleem met verbinden met de blockchain nodes.
SETTINGS.WORDS_TEXT: Je back-up woorden correleren met je geheime sleutel
COPIED_MNEMONIC: Je back-up woorden zijn gekopieërd naar je klembord
IMPORT_WORDS_TITLE: Twee manieren om je back-up woorden in te voeren:
LIGHT_WALLET_INFO_TEXT: Onthoud dat MyETPwallet.com geen toegang heeft tot je Wallet sleutels. Als je je back-up woorden of je sleutel bestand verliest, kunnen wij je geen toegang geven tot je fondsen.
MESSAGE.LOGOUT_CONFIRM: Weet je zeker dat je wilt uitloggen?
SUCCESS_SEND_TEXT: Transactie is verzonden naar het netwerk, wacht AUB op bevestigingen. Je transactie hash is:
IMPORT_MNEMONIC_TEXT: Een Wallet bestand is aangemaakt voor je. Dit bestand geeft je toegang tot je Wallet, bewaar het goed.
ENTER_PASSWORD_HEADLINE: Voer wachtwoord in voor je sleutelbestand
BACKUP_WORDS_WRITE_DOWN_TEXT: Noteer AUB de volgende 24 woorden op papier, je hebt ze nodig om je Wallet te herstellen, het is erg belangrijk dat je ze ergens veilig opslaat, deel deze back-up woorden met niemand.
SHOW_ALL_ASSET_BALANCES: Geef saldo voor alle bezittingen weer
LOGIN_MENU_INFO_TEXT: Opmerking voor bestaande MVS Wallet gebruikers: Bij de eerste inlog op MyETPwallet.com, creëer een sleutelbestand vanuit de back-up woorden en open de Wallet dan vanuit dit bestand.

DISCLAIMER.HEADLINE: Disclaimer
DISCLAIMER.INTRODUCTION: Deze light wallet is ontworpen gebaseerd op blockchain technologie. Alle account informatie en transacties wordt opgeslagen op publiekelijk opgeslagen blockchains. De Wallet service provider slaat de geheime sleutels en back-up woorden van de gebruikers niet op (samengevat, 'geheime sleutel informatie') in een gecentralizeerde database. De geheime sleutel informatie en gegenereerde bestanden van de gebruiker zijn alleen van de persoon die de Wallet gecreëerd heeft. De gebruiker heeft zelf de verantwoordelijkheid tot het veilig bewaren van zijn/haar geheime sleutels en wachtwoord en is verantwoordelijk voor het gebruik van zijn/haar account, wachtwoord en geheime sleutel informatie.
DISCLAIMER.LIST_INTRODUCTION: You agree that the wallet service provider will not bear any responsibility in the following situations:
DISCLAIMER.LIST_ITEM_1: Leaks of personal information due to the user having made known his wallet password/private key information to others, the user not having safeguarded his/her password/private key information, the user having shared his/her wallet account, or any other mistakes that are not committed by the wallet service provider.
DISCLAIMER.LIST_ITEM_2: The use of this service involves internet services and may be affected by unstable connections. The use of this service entails the risk of service disruptions or services being unable to meet the demands of users due to the following: events of force majeure, malware, viruses and other malicious software, attacks by hackers, unstable operating systems, users’ geographical location, users shutting down their devices and other reasons related to the Internet, technology and telecommunication lines. Users must understand and undertake the above risks. The wallet service provider will not be responsible for any consequences resulting from the use of this service.
DISCLAIMER.LIST_ITEM_3: The use of asset transfer services is based on users having sufficient knowledge about the counterparty (including but not limited to the counterparty’s real-world identity). There is no way to recall, revoke or undo asset transfers once they have been executed. Users will undertake all risks resulting from the use of asset transfer services once they have executed a transfer. The wallet service provider shall have no legal responsibility for any disputes that arise due to asset transfers. These disputes will be resolved by the sending and receiving parties.
DISCLAIMER.LIST_ITEM_4: The service provider only provides technical support for the wallet and will not provide technical support for any other service.
DISCLAIMER.READ_AND_AGREE: I have read and agree to the entire disclaimer and voluntarily undertake the risks and responsibilities communicated.

LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.TITLE: Legal disclaimer
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.BRIEF_EXPLAIN: MyETPWallet.com makes it easy for you to create, save, and access your information and assets and interact with the Metaverse blockchain. You are solely responsible for managing your funds and for maintaining the security of your Private Key and any mnemonic passphrase (‘backup words’) associated with your wallet.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.WARNING: Before using this wallet, please be aware that there are important risks associated with cryptocurrency and blockchain-based open-source software such as large exchange rate fluctuations and software bugs. By registering an account through MyETPWallet.com or MVSD, you agree that you have read, understood and accept all of the terms and conditions contained in this Disclaimer.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.I_TITLE: I. Accessing and Controlling Wallet Information
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.I_INFO: 1.1 When you create a Wallet account, it generates a mnemonic passphrase (‘backup words’) consisting of 24 English words and a Public and Private keypair used to send and receive digital currency. You must backup your mnemonic passphrase and Private Key information and keep it secure; failure to do so may result in the loss of control of the assets within your Wallet.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.I_INFO_2: 1.2 The Wallet does not collect or store any of our Users’ private information, including as your password and the private keys. This information is stored locally on the User’s own device. Hence, we cannot assist you with Wallet retrieval. The Development Team is only responsible for guaranteeing wallet access and fixing software bugs, and is unable to restore encrypted private keys or otherwise recover private keys. If you use MyETPWallet.com, you acknowledge that Metaverse is not responsible for safeguarding or maintaining private keys associated with the wallet. We strongly advise you to back up your wallet files to best protect your property rights.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.II_INFO_1: 2.1 The Metaverse Team will implement appropriate security measures to protect Users against data loss, inappropriate use, unauthorized access and/or disclosure. For example, we implement high-standard encryption techniques such as SSL to protect your personal information. Please be advised that we cannot guarantee the absolute security of any data you disclose online, due to technical limitations and unforeseeable hostile actions against the platform. By using our service, the User acknowledges the possibility that the system and telecommunication network they use to access our service can be compromised, which is out of our control. For instance, the software the User has downloaded or websites visited may contain viruses or malwares that threaten the security of the wallet information. Therefore, it is imperative that Users ensure the security of their personal information and data. You accept the inherent security risks of providing information and dealing online over the Internet and will not hold us responsible for any breach of security unless this is due to our negligence. The development team recommends that Users pay special attention to backing up password and private keys offline (e.g. writing them on a piece of paper).
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.II_INFO_2: 2.2 Under no circumstances should Users trust information originating from non-official sources. Any wallet operation should only take place after the User has completed due diligence and assessed the counterparty’s identity.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.II_INFO_3: 2.3 It is the sole responsibility of the User to protect their wallet security. The developers from the Metaverse Team will take appropriate technical measures in accordance with industry standards to protect data security on the User’s device but are not legally responsible of any data or funds loss. In those circumstance, the User acknowledges and agrees that the Metaverse Team does not guarantee the complete safety of the wallet funds.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.III_INFO: Should you have any question regarding the privacy policies above, please contact us using the following email address: info@mvs.org
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER.FOOTER: The Metaverse Team reserves the right to interpret and change the aforementioned clauses at any time, in our sole discretion. MyETPWallet is distributed under the protection of the MIT open source protocol.

PASSWORD_WARNING: We advise you to use a strong password for your own security.
NOTICE_TRANSACTION_FEE_UNCOVERED: Please make sure that you have enough ETP to cover the transaction fee.
ENTER_PASSWORD_HEADLINE_MOBILE: Enter your password to decode your private key
SETTINGS.SHOW_QRCODE_TEXT: Export your private key to the mobile application MyETPWallet.
IMPORT_MNEMONIC_TEXT_MOBILE: Your private key will be stored encrypted via your password on your device.
RESET_MESSAGE_MOBILE: All data will be erased. To log in, you will need your backup words or scan the QR Code from your desktop Light wallet.
IMPORT.SCAN_QRCODE_TEXT: Import my account to my phone
NOTICE_ASSET_ISSUE_FEE: Please be aware that the creation of a new asset cost 10 ETP.
ISSUE.NOTICE_TRANSACTION_FEE_UNCOVERED: You need at least 10 ETP to create an asset
ISSUE.ISSUE_ADDRESS: Issue address (address receiving the new token)
ISSUE.CONFIRMATION_SUBTITLE: Are you sure you want to create an asset?
EXPORT.HEADLINE: Connect your phone
EXPORT.INTRODUCTION: To download the MyETPWallet on your phone, please visit MyETPWallet.com and click on 'Download Wallet'.
EXPORT.TEXT: This action will export your Private key to your phone. Your Private key will be encrypted with the password used for this account and saved on your mobile device. Please scan this QR Code from the mobile application MyETPWallet.
EXPORT.REMINDER_LOGOUT: Please logout from the app if you switch your phone.
LOGIN_MENU_INFO_TEXT_MOBILE: Notice: To create an account, please use your desktop and go to MyETPWallet.com. You will then be able to link your account with your phone.
MESSAGE.PASSWORD_WRONG: Unable to decrypt wallet using given passphrase
HOW_TO_IMPORT_WALLET_MOBILE_TITLE: How to import your Private Key?
HOW_TO_IMPORT_WALLET_MOBILE_STEP1: Open the Light wallet on your desktop go to Settings, and then Connect phone
HOW_TO_IMPORT_WALLET_MOBILE_STEP3: Enjoy your wallet on your phone!
MESSAGE.ISSUE_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: You need at least 10 ETP to create an Asset.
